press_lever.description: Press the lever of the coffee machine.

clean_lever.description: Clean the lever to ensure it works properly.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob of the coffee machine.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure it works properly.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to keep it tidy and clean.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean all interactive parts of the coffee machine to keep it in good condition and ensure proper functioning.
